sqlMap.select: SELECT im.*, p.PROV_NM FROM import im LEFT JOIN provider p on im.PROV_CD = p.PROV_CD
SELECT detail.*, (SELECT SRVC_NM FROM srvc S WHERE S.SRVC_ID = detail.SRVC_ID) AS SRVC_NAME FROM import_detail detail WHERE detail.IMPRT_CD = #IMPRT_CD# and detail.RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO import ( IMPRT_BILL , USER_NAME , CHANGETIME , PROV_CD , PROV_NM , TOTAL_MONEY , DISCOUNT_MONEY , NEEDTOPAYED , PAYED_MONEY , DATE_IMPORT , RESTAR_ID , DESCRIPTION , IMPRT_CD ) VALUES ( #IMPRT_BILL# , #USER_NAME# , now() , #PROV_CD# , #PROV_NM# , #TOTAL_MONEY# , #DISCOUNT_MONEY# , #NEEDTOPAYED# , #PAYED_MONEY# , #DATE_IMPORT# , #RESTAR_ID# , #DESCRIPTION# , #IMPRT_CD# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS IMPRT_CD

UPDATE import SET IMPRT_BILL = #IMPRT_BILL# , USER_NAME = #USER_NAME# , PROV_CD = #PROV_CD# , PROV_NM = #PROV_NM# , TOTAL_MONEY = #TOTAL_MONEY# , NEEDTOPAYED = #NEEDTOPAYED# , PAYED_MONEY = #PAYED_MONEY#
DATE_IMPORT = #DATE_IMPORT#
, CHANGETIME = now() , DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION# WHERE IMPRT_CD = #IMPRT_CD# and RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT im.* FROM import im LEFT JOIN provider p on im.PROV_CD = p.PROV_CD
im.DATE_IMPORT >= #STARTDATE#
im.DATE_IMPORT <= #ENDDATE#
im.RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID#
order by im.DATE_IMPORT desc
SELECT * FROM srvc S WHERE S.RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID#

SELECT L.*, @row := @row + 1 AS rn1 FROM( SELECT sum(T.TOTAL_MONEY) as TOTAL_MONEY , sum(T.amount) as IAMOUNT , T.SRVC_ID , T.UNIT FROM import_detail as T LEFT JOIN import im ON im.IMPRT_CD = T.IMPRT_CD
im.DATE_IMPORT >= #STARTDATE#
im.DATE_IMPORT <= #ENDDATE#
im.RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID#
and T.unit != ''
group by T.srvc_id , T.UNIT ) L,(SELECT @row := 0) K
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( select h.* , @row := @row + 1 AS rn1 from () h ,(SELECT @row := 0) K ) t
WHERE rn1 > #MIN# and rn1 <= #MAX#
SELECT count(t.SRVC_NM) as COUNT FROM () t
SELECT M.* FROM( SELECT h.*, @row := @row + 1 AS rn1 from () h ,(SELECT @row := 0) K order by h.DATE_IMPORT desc ) M WHERE rn1 > #MIN# and rn1 <= #MAX#
SELECT count(t.IMPRT_CD) as COUNT, sum(t.TOTAL_MONEY) as total FROM () t
SELECT count(t.rn1) as COUNT FROM () t

SELECT M.* FROM( SELECT K.*, N.SRVC_CD, N.SRVC_NM, N.AMOUNT_STORE, N.PRICE_IMPORT FROM() K left join srvc N on N.srvc_id = K.srvc_id where N.is_used = 1 )M
M.rn1 > #MIN#
M.rn1 <= #MAX#

SELECT sum(total_money) as TOTAL, DATE_FORMAT(changetime, '%Y') as YEAR, DATE_FORMAT(changetime, '%m') as MONTH FROM import WHERE DATE_FORMAT(changetime, '%Y') = #YEAR# and RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID# group by Month
select A.* from( SELECT t.*, @row := @row + 1 AS rn1 FROM () t ,(SELECT @row := 0) K ORDER BY t.IMPRT_CD DESC ) A where A.rn1 = 1
